title: Resolving the Imbalance Issue in Hierarchical Disciplinary Topic Inference via LLM-based Data Augmentation. (arXiv:2310.05318v2 [cs.CL] UPDATED)
abstract: In addressing the imbalanced issue of data within the realm of Natural Language Processing, text data augmentation methods have emerged as pivotal solutions. This data imbalance is prevalent in the research proposals submitted during the funding application process. Such imbalances, resulting from the varying popularity of disciplines or the emergence of interdisciplinary studies, significantly impede the precision of downstream topic models that deduce the affiliated disciplines of these proposals. At the data level, proposals penned by experts and scientists are inherently complex technological texts, replete with intricate terminologies, which augmenting such specialized text data poses unique challenges. At the system level, this, in turn, compromises the fairness of AI-assisted reviewer assignment systems, which raises a spotlight on solving this issue. This study leverages large language models (Llama V1) as data generators to augment research proposals categorized within intrica

translated_title: 通过基于LLM的数据增强解决层级学科主题推断中的不平衡问题
translated_abstract: 在自然语言处理领域中，为解决数据不平衡问题，文本数据增强方法已成为关键性解决方案。在资金申请过程中提交的研究提案中存在这种数据不平衡问题。这种不平衡由学科的受欢迎程度或跨学科研究的出现引起，严重影响了能够推断出这些提案所属学科的下游主题模型的准确性。在数据层面上，由专家和科学家撰写的提案本质上是复杂的技术文本，充斥着复杂的术语，因此增强这种专业文本数据带来了独特的挑战。在系统层面上，这反过来损害了AI辅助评审员分配系统的公平性，从而引发了解决这个问题的关注点。本研究利用大型语言模型（Llama V1）作为数据生成器来增强分类在复杂学科分类中的研究提案。
tldr: 本研究利用大型语言模型作为数据生成器，通过增强研究提案来解决在自然语言处理领域中存在的数据不平衡问题，从而提高下游主题模型对提案所属学科的准确性，并解决AI辅助评审员分配系统中的公平性问题。
